properties.name: Victorinox flagship store
properties.description: You can also find knives in a lot of stores and at the airport, but here is the complete collection (also a few other items). Have your name engraved for 5 more francs and a few minutes of waiting.

properties.name: Orell Füssli
properties.description: Big library. Mostly in German, but the 3rd floor is dedicated to English books.

properties.name: Schweizer Heimatwerk
properties.description: Things made in Switzerland. Quite expensive but you'll maybe leave with a small handmade wooden cow crafted by Trauffer, century-old Swiss toymaker.

properties.name: Berg und Tal
properties.description: Local specialties, mostly from the Zurich region (a few products from other cantons): wine and schnapps, dried sausages and a small selection of local cheeses, Alp salt and Tsüri sauce, biscuits, chocolate bars from Zürcher manufacturers that you won't find elsewhere (Tsüri Schoggi, Taucherli). Also a few postcards.

properties.name: Marc Döhring
properties.description: Microscopic bakery that sells a few cakes and also Schweizer Guetzli (Swiss traditionnal cookies). The selection is a bit smaller outside of Christmas time.
